allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''C:\\Personal\\Code\\1-Testing\\Smart-Notification-Router''; gh release create v0.7.0.2 --title ''v0.7.0.2'' --notes ''## What''''s New

### Dark Blue Theme & Theme Toggle
- Added dark/light/system theme toggle in the header
- Dark mode now uses a dark blue color scheme instead of pure black

### Rule Duplication
- Added duplicate button for both immediate and correlation rules
- Duplicated rules are created with a \(copy\) suffix and disabled by default

### Wider Rule Builder
- Rule builder dialog expanded to 80% viewport width
- Match condition field path input widened for better readability

### Admin Role System
- Added role field to user model \(defaults to admin\)
- First registered user automatically becomes admin
- Registration is disabled after the first user signs up
- Login page conditionally shows the signup link only when no users exist
- Register page redirects to login if registration is closed

### Other
- Added SNR logo to README
- Added /api/auth/registration-status endpoint'' 2>&1")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''C:\\Personal\\Code\\1-Testing\\Smart-Notification-Router''; git tag v0.7.0.2; git push origin v0.7.0.2 2>&1")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command @'
$token = \(cmdkey /list:git:https://github.com 2>&1 | Out-String\)
# Try using git credential fill to get the token
$cred = ""protocol=https`nhost=github.com`n"" | git credential fill 2>&1
$cred
'@)
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "echo ''protocol=https''; echo ''host=github.com''; echo '''' | git credential fill 2>&1")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Set-Location ''C:\\Personal\\Code\\1-Testing\\Smart-Notification-Router''; $releaseBody = @{tag_name=''v0.7.0.2''; name=''v0.7.0.2''; body=''## Whats New\\n\\n### Dark Blue Theme and Theme Toggle\\n- Added dark/light/system theme toggle in the header\\n- Dark mode now uses a dark blue color scheme instead of pure black\\n\\n### Rule Duplication\\n- Added duplicate button for both immediate and correlation rules\\n- Duplicated rules are created with a \(copy\) suffix and disabled by default\\n\\n### Wider Rule Builder\\n- Rule builder dialog expanded to 80% viewport width\\n- Match condition field path input widened for better readability\\n\\n### Admin Role System\\n- Added role field to user model \(defaults to admin\)\\n- First registered user automatically becomes admin\\n- Registration is disabled after the first user signs up\\n- Login page conditionally shows the signup link only when no users exist\\n- Register page redirects to login if registration is closed\\n\\n### Other\\n- Added SNR logo to README\\n- Added /api/auth/registration-status endpoint''; draft=$false; prerelease=$false} | ConvertTo-Json; Write-Output $releaseBody")
